resources.string: Unable to get current weather
The application could not determine the current weather for your location.
Too cloudy
It\'s too cloudy to see any aurora right now.
Probably too cloudy
It\'s probably too cloudy to see any aurora right now.
Unable to get location
The application could not determine your location.
It\'s too bright outside
It\'s too bright outside to see any aurora.
Probably too bright
It\'s probably too bright outside to see any aurora.
Unable to get solar activity
The application could not determine the current solar activity.
Not enough solar activity
There is not enough solar activity to see any aurora right now.
Too far away
You are too far away from any magnetic pole to see any aurora right now.

The app is updating the current information. Please wait, or pull down to refresh.
